price: ក្រោយមក ទ្រង់បានបង្កើតពូជពង្សរបស់គេចេញពីទឹកកាម ដែលគ្មានតម្លៃ ។
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسۡلَهُۥ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿala naslahu min sulālatin min māin mahīnin
